question: Which renowned personality has been named as the brand ambassador of Tribes India?
explanation: Recently, Five-time world champion boxer MC Mary Kom has been named as the brand ambassador of Tribes India - an initiative of Ministry of Tribal Affairs to promote tribal artefacts. Apart from this, the Ministry of Tribal Affairs launched the \"Punch Tantra\" collection to promote tribal artefacts. Punch Tantra is an exclusive collection, which comprises a range of ethic and traditional tribal handicrafts and handloom products.
